title: Chimani
description:
Get the most comprehensive guide to all 419 national parks in the United States. Researched and written by local traveler experts - quickly learn about each park’s history and highlights.


Planning a road trip? Use our custom map to discover all those “small parks” along your route.


Best of all - use Chimani to “verify” your visits to national parks with our GPS-based “check-in” feature which unlocks special “verified” badges and Chimani “experience points”.
